questions.questionText: She usually _____ for a walk in the evening. (go)
My mother _____ delicious meals every Sunday. (cook)
They _____ their favorite TV show at 8 PM tonight. (watch)
He _____ soccer with his friends on Saturdays. (play)
The train to London _____ at 9:15 AM every morning. (depart)
Right now, she _____ a book in her room. (read)
I can't talk on the phone at the moment because I _____ to work. (drive)
They _____ a movie at the cinema this evening. (watch)
He _____ for his final exams this week. (study)
We can't play soccer now because it _____. (rain)
She _____ three different countries so far. (visit)
They _____ dinner before the movie starts. (already eat)
He _____ a member of the club since last year. (be)
I _____ my homework, so I can relax now. (just finish)
We _____ this type of cuisine before. (never try)

questions.exerciseType: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: She _____ for the exam for the past few hours. (study)

questions.exerciseType: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: They _____ on the project since yesterday morning. (work)

questions.exerciseType: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: He _____ the piano all afternoon. (practicing)

questions.exerciseType: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: I _____ this book for a while, and it's really interesting. (read)

questions.exerciseType: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: We _____ for the bus for over half an hour. (wait)
What __________ when the power went out?
She __________ a book while her brother played outside.
When I saw him, he __________ dinner in the kitchen.
They __________ a movie when the storm started.
Last night 7 p.m, I __________ for my English test.

questions.exerciseType: Quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: By the time I arrived, they _____ for over an hour. (wait)

questions.exerciseType: Quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: She _____ at that company for five years before she moved to a new job. (work)

questions.exerciseType: Quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: We were tired because we _____ all day. (hike)

questions.exerciseType: Quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: He _____ for the exam the whole week, so he felt well-prepared. (study)

questions.exerciseType: Quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn
questions.questionText: By the time the party started, they _____ the venue for hours. (decorate)
